page.text: That last assault left you reeling, it's all you can do to re-orientate yourself. As you do the cetan swiftly circles back around, a predatory gleam in her eye. She lets out a pleased rumble as she approaches and grabs ahold of you, weakened and in the hands of this powerful aquatic predator your fate is truly hers to decide.

You see her tongue run along her lips, then dart out as she draws you in close in order to taste over your form. The saliva diffusing into the surrounding water afore she shifts her grip firmly down around your chest and upper arms and nomphs over the top of your head. The warmth of the cetan's mouth encompassing you swiftly down to your shoulders as she pushes you in hungrily, swallowing you up like the meal you are to her. Her hands sliding down to your waist to help feed your squirming, but not meaningfully resisting, body down her throat.

Her lips slide down around your waist and she straightens her body letting go of your scissoring legs to ease your passage down into her body. You can hear her moans at your flavour mingled with the pulsing throb and flow of her insides as you travel deeper and deeper inside her body. You can feel yet more of your body slide out of the cooler waters into the hot tightness of her body as her lips encroach up your legs. Soon you'll be entirely devoured.

You feel your body forced to undulate with her motions as she begins to swim, tail flexing around you and forcing you to move with her as enzymes begin to seep into your heated prison.

You're not about to just stay here and get digested. Time to get out of here, it'll be difficult to crawl back up that flexing and undulating throat but the struggle is preferable to ending up fat on her thick ass tail. You turn yourself around, curling in on yourself and then straightening and shoving your hands up her throat. The sensations most disagreeable for her as she tries to swallow you back down, but to no avail as you haul yourself back up out of her mouth. The cetan now drifting and twitching a bit in the aftermath of you forcing your way out into the open ocean again.

You're not about to just stay here and get digested. Time to get out of here, it'll be difficult to crawl back up that flexing and undulating throat but the struggle is preferable to ending up fat on her thick ass tail. You turn yourself around, curling in on yourself and then straightening and shoving your hands up her throat. The cetan letting out a distressed rumble as she finds you attempting to push off against the inside of her slick innards and shoving your way up her throat. The cetan too powerful to resist as she responds to your repeated attempts to get back up her throat by simply forcing you back down into her belly as it becomes increasingly inhospitable in its digestive vigor.

gameover.text: The cetan swims on, unmindful of the helpless squirmings occuring deep within that contoured and shifting bulge her tail sports. Your body softening within her gut, the undulating walls massaging you down into a formless mass and from thence into a glob of undifferentiated fluid. This thick soup of former adventurer proves only too readily absorbed, your remnants flowing down through her insides to be sopped up and used to nourish and fuel the aquatic predator. Perhaps a subnautical adventure was not the life you were meant for. But no matter your mistakes you're now nought but a layer of fat padding her tail as the mer swims on.

page.text: If you ignore the certain knowledge that this belly you're in is about to digest you you can learn to appreciate the feeling of this hot stomach and its sticky fluids coating your form as the cetan undulates rthythmically. Or perhaps that certain knowledge is something you're comfortable with as you feel her enzymes soak into your body, coating your flesh and seeping through your pores and permeating your body to the core. You can feel it, the slow and inexorable break down of your form into something more fitting for you as the Cetan's meal..perhaps you even welcome it.

The Cetan keeps ahold of you with one hand as she reaches down with the other. A genital slit opening up at her crotch, a girthy cock and hefty sack squeeze out into the open water. That thick pink length of hers rising to arousal as she strokes one hand over her it and rumbles in pleasure.
